column5: How was the ice on Monday. Have you checked it since. Safe for sleds and gear?
Good morning, While Brian is busy - ice is good. Perch grounds from 7 inches all way to 15. BBP has 9 at some spots - quite a few atv and snowmobiles were on the ice yesterday. Good luck
Thanks Cos. Give BBP a  few more days. Was thinking more in Kemp bay.
Thanks for the update my  friend  Morning Paul I got word this morning they were traveling yesterday. Will update further Friday bud. Saturday Im only walking 1/4 mile.
Pm sent. Keeping the north wind to my back, and to my back for the walk back in. Might be able to ride the smitty in. LOL  Were getting a good sqaul here right now.

Well we gave it the ole Canadian hardcore try. -29, wind from the north making the wind chill -40 at 6:30 am. We walked out set up and didnt open the door til we were ready to leave. Even with the heater on full, the hut was frosting up still.  Finder battery was dieing quick. Sun came up,hut warming up , and battery coming to life again. Enjoyed seeing you again Paul. Enjoyed your tunes and your singing.  BTW Terry, Paul takes out more crap then you.
no way what he takes the kitchen sink and the  taps just a little too cold for me
Good to see you too B. Had to keep shaking propane tank. Try to freeze up while in use. And the microwave Terry.
